entities.name: noblev
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as a person who is helping Harry in the situation. He is described as being firm and willing to fight against the Death Eaters.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who is trying to escape from the Death Eaters with Neville's help. He is described as whispering instructions to Neville.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a person who is injured and needs to be rescued by Harry and Neville. She is described as being limp and needing to be carried.

relationships.description: Harry and Neville are working together to escape from the Death Eaters. Harry is giving instructions to Neville, who is helping him carry Hermione.
Neville is also helping Harry in their escape plan. He is carrying Hermione and fighting against the Death Eaters with Harry's help.
Harry is trying to rescue Hermione from the situation. He is helping Neville carry her and giving instructions on how to escape.
